holidays.title: National Taco Day
holidays.description: A concentrated and intensified version of the “Taco Tuesdays” many restaurants offer. We aren't complaining!

holidays.title: National Vodka Day
holidays.description: Today, vodka is the most widely-consumed spirit in the world — quite the accomplishment!

holidays.title: Coffee with a Cop Day
holidays.description: Get your cup ready and go to the nearest restaurant to drink coffee with a cop.

holidays.title: Feast of St. Francis of Assisi
holidays.description: The acclaimed Catholic friar, philosopher, mystic, and teacher, is celebrated with the Feast of Saint Francis.

holidays.title: Improve Your Office Day
holidays.description: Even if your office is your bedroom, we’ve got ideas to make it extra special.

holidays.title: International Walk to School Day
holidays.description: Make sure your shoes are made for walking; it’s Walk to School Day!

holidays.title: Kindness to Animal Day
holidays.description: Kindness to Animals Day is here, and we want to ensure you know how to celebrate.

holidays.title: Lesotho Independence Day
holidays.description: Commemorate Lesotho’s anniversary of national independence, marking its liberation from the British Empire.

holidays.title: National Golf Lovers Day
holidays.description: Hit the links and play a round with your fellow sufferers.

holidays.title: National Kale Day
holidays.description: Eating healthy never tasted this good as we celebrate National Kale Day.

holidays.title: National Pumpkin Seed Day
holidays.description: It’s pumpkin seeds bingeing time!

holidays.title: National Truckers Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Settle in, put on your favorite playlist, and hit the road as we celebrate truckers.

holidays.title: National Walk and Bike to School Day
holidays.description: You've probably heard stories of how your parents or grandparents had to walk miles to school.

holidays.title: Semana Morazánica
holidays.description: Celebrate Semana Morazánic with the people of Honduras, a day established to honor Franciso Morazán.

holidays.title: World Animal Day
holidays.description: It's World Animal Day and we’re planning to make a big roar.

holidays.title: World Habitat Day
holidays.description: Homes build lives and strengthen the future.

holidays.title: Alicia Silverstone’s Birthday
holidays.description: Celebrating this beautiful actress whose acting career has flourished and been a worldwide success!

holidays.title: Amara La Negra’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this superstar, nothing stops her from soaring higher. Celebrate her today!

holidays.title: Ashley Banjo’s Birthday
holidays.description: He has worked hard on his talent and skills to achieve a thriving career.

holidays.title: Buster Keaton’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this talented actor, filmmaker, and comedian, talent was born, not made.

holidays.title: Caitriona Balfe’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this exceptional actress, she has achieved enviable success and an untainted legacy!

holidays.title: Charlton Heston’s Birthday
holidays.description: This Hollywood star’s charisma and talent have inspired so many generations of actors.

holidays.title: Dakota Johnson’s Birthday
holidays.description: From Miss Golden Globe to blockbuster feature film actress, this star is carving a stellar career!

holidays.title: Derrick Rose’s Birthday
holidays.description: Playing record games and winning coveted awards, Rose is an automatic M.V.P!

holidays.title: Drone Supremacy’s Birthday
holidays.description: This creative YouTuber is just a few uploads away from a movie deal!

holidays.title: Fintan Magee’s Birthday
holidays.description: This street artist has cemented his place as one of Australia's top public painters.

holidays.title: Francesca from Magic Box’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young, skillful and hardworking social media personality and entrepreneur is unstoppable!

holidays.title: Ignazio Boschetto’s Birthday
holidays.description: There's only so little left for this skillful singer and musician to achieve.

holidays.title: Jovita Moore’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this renowned news anchor, the future was promising. Celebrate her life today.

holidays.title: Lil Mama’s Birthday
holidays.description: She does an excellent job of entertaining us while maintaining a cheerful attitude!

holidays.title: Melissa Benoist’s Birthday
holidays.description: Melissa Benoist has been a real-life superwoman throughout her life’s journey. Let’s celebrate her!

holidays.title: Rich Homie Quan’s Birthday
holidays.description: Quan has always displayed an interest in poetry, creative writing, and music from a young age.

holidays.title: Rupi Kaur’s Birthday
holidays.description: This exceptionally gifted writer has embarked on an inspirational and impactful career.

holidays.title: Russell Simmons’s Birthday
holidays.description: This music mogul’s record label has helped propel many prominent musicians to fame.

holidays.title: Yoon Jeonghan’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented pop singer has climbed up the ladder of success in the entertainment industry.
